teacher_info.about_teacher:
I have been teaching English for almost 9 years. As a professional content manager and copywriter, I will teach you how to speak English fluently and write amazing texts. 
Let’s have some fun and make your language goals achievable!
If you want to get 100% success from my lessons, I recommend taking classes on a regular basis. I will prepare a customized learning plan according to your needs and goals. 
I also offer conversational classes, so you can be at any place you want and talk to me freely! You will speak 80% of the total time of our lesson.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I offer different lessons:
• English exams preparation. I will explain structure to you and we will work with sample tests as well as improve your English skills. ( P.S. I WILL TEACH YOU HOW TO ACE IELTS WITH 8+ )
• Conversational English. Speak, speak, speak! Practice makes perfect. I will gently correct your mistakes.
•A1-C2 English. We will choose a textbook and do different activities. We will speak, play, sing, learn new words, write, and read.
•Business English. I will teach you how to sound like a pro and prepare you for a job interview.

teacher_info.introduction:
Dear students,
My name is Katya. I am a Russian native speaker who was born and raised in Latvia. I currently teach Russian, English and Chinese languages. I have worked as a language teacher since 2012. My lessons are tailored to suit your needs whether it is language for traveling, business, school and etc. Please feel free to send me a message before our first lesson telling me your goals and expectations. I will happily share useful materials, resources and tips that can help you in the learning process. 
I hold a Bachelor's degree in Business Chinese from Xiamen University, HSK certificate, Cambridge English Proficiency certificate (CPE), which is CEFR C2 level, and a TESOL certificate. I love traveling and currently I am exploring a life of a digital nomad. I would love to learn about your culture, so let’s explore this world together!

I use Skype, Google Docs, Google Drive and PDF, so If you are planning to use a mobile device (iPad etc) during our lessons, please let me know to avoid any disruption

Дорогие ученики!
Меня зовут Катя. Я профессиональный преподаватель английского, китайского и русского языков из Латвии. Программа наших уроков будет специально подобрана исходя из ваших нужд. Перед нашим первым уроком, напишите мне сообщение и расскажите о ваших целях и пожеланиях. Я с радостью поделюсь всеми необходимыми материалами, полезными ресурсами и моим личным опытом, чтобы сделать процесс обучения максимально эффективным и приятным для вас. До встречи!

На уроках я использую Skype, Google Docs, Google Drive и если вы планируете использовать iPad во время уроков, сообщите заранее, во избежание сбоев.

你好！
我叫卡蒂亚。我是拉脱维亚人。你要提高你的俄语，英语或者汉语水平吗？上课以前请您让我知道您的外语水平以及目标。
如果您打算用iPad或者其他的移动设备，请提前告诉我。课上见！～

teacher_info.about_teacher:
I’m sure that everyone can learn languages. You only need to practice. I have a bachelor's degree in linguistics. And currently I am improving my teaching qualifications at Moscow State University. I’m a kind, polite and patient teacher.
I try to not only explain the rules of Russian to my students, but also to make them fall in love with my adorable country.
teacher_info.teaching_style: I prefer to teach Russian in relaxed and informal way. We will discuss different topics, that you like. I will explain some rules, we’ll pay attention to phonetics, grammar and vocabulary. I have a lot of materials (textbooks, workbooks, audios, videos, etc.) that help us. But surely we can correct your lessons, according to your interests.

course_info.trial_description:
This lesson will help us to know each other. You can ask me any questions and tell me your aims. We will discuss some topics and you can understand the plan of our lessons.

Урок поможет нам узнать друг друга. Вы сможете задать любые вопросы и сказать мне Ваши цели. Мы обсудим некоторые темы, и Вы сможете понять план наших уроков.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for any level and any goal
pro_course_detail.description:
This lesson is based on individual approach. We will friendly discuss different topics, I’ll help you to learn Russian grammar, improve your pronunciation and expand vocabulary. But the main accent is a speaking practice.

Этот урок основан на индивидуальном подходе. Мы будем обсуждать разные темы, улучшать грамматику, произношение и расширять словарный запас. Но главный акцент - это разговорная практика.

pro_course_detail.title: NEW! How to become Russian in 1 hour
pro_course_detail.description:
This is not just a regular lesson…We will discover Russian language, culture, traditions, cuisine and something else by playing an exciting QUIZ!

If you are a beginner this experience will help you get to know Russia better and understand if you really want to learn Russian.

If you already learn Russian you will know typical Russian words and phrases, that you can’t find in textbooks.

If you are going to visit Russia at this experience you will learn what you should necessarily do in Russia to become a real Russian!

Anyway, thanks to this lesson you will definitely fall in love with Russia and Russian language!

Mostly we will make a lesson in English with inclusion of Russian phrases and words. So you will feel relaxed while enjoying the quiz!

teacher_info.intro:
Hello, my dear student! 
My name is Anastasia. 
I am an English teacher with CELTA and TESOL certificates and more than 5 years of experience.
I worked in China as an English teacher and in Skyeng online school (one of the most popular online schools in Russia)

Do you have a language barrier? Do you need to improve your speaking and writing skills? 
Perhaps, you would like to know more phrasal verbs or slang words to sound like a native speaker.
Maybe you are going to take an international exam but you don't know how to estimate your English level.
If it's about you, welcome to my page! 
I'll be happy to be of assistance to you!

teacher_info.about_teacher:
Having obtained extensive working experience, I have gathered many supplementary resources that make lessons interesting and saturated. We'll watch videos on Youtube, learn new vocabulary, read the news, discuss various topics.
I keep up to date with the latest news, so that we may discuss whatever topics you are into.
As I have been learning English as a second language since my childhood, I am aware of common problems that non-natives may face while learning English. 
That's why I may help you to get rid of fossilized mistakes in your speech and give recommendations on improving your English.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I do my best to involve you in studying process and feel comfortable at lessons. 
My task is to facilitate the process of learning the second language. 
Usually I reveal your current level and goals at the first lesson. 
To my mind, it’s important to be aware of student’s aims. It helps me keep you motivated and create a lesson plan, which is relevant to your purposes.

exp_info.description: I have been conducting the English lessons on Italki for more than a year. Overall, I've already had 200 students and held more than 1500 lessons. I'm giving conversational and grammar classes. Some students successfully passed international exams, such as APTIS and TOEFL. I've received plenty of positive testimonials.

I've been working for a Russian online school 'Skyeng' for more than a year. My responsibilities are to: provide English lessons to students; check student’s homework; participate in all webinars and training courses. It was a great experience of working online with an interactive platform. Also, working for 'Skyeng' included many workshops and seminars related to teaching, so I guess this experience is helpful for working for Italki.

Profi.ru is a Russian platform where students may find their teacher to study both online and offline. I've used this platform for 5 years and gained lots of positive feedback from satisfied customers. On profi.ru I've worked with people of different ages. The youngest student I had there was only 1 year and a half. I'll attach screenshots from Profi.ru account below.

edu_info.description: In fact, this is not a Bachelor's degree. This is additional education to the Bachelor's degree. I had many subjects related to the English language and its grammar.

cert_info.description: Here is the certificate that I got while working for Skyeng. This certificate was given to teachers who fulfilled their KPI and whose lessons were highly estimated by Skyeng team.
This certificate confirms that I'm able to teach English to speakers of other languages. It was an intensive course related to principles and methods of teaching English.
Certificate in Teaching English to Speakers of Other Languages

This is the 22 hours practically-oriented course that included studying of lesson planning, methodology and holding online lessons with students. All lessons were checked by mentors. As a result, all participants got their marks and detailed feedback from mentors.
I have completed 4 hours online course on Bitish pronunciation that is held by a native speaker from England.

course_info.trial_description: At the trial lesson I reveal your current level and purposes in learning English. You'll be given a test that contains several grammar and vocabulary questions and then we'll have a small talk to get to know each other.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational English
pro_course_detail.description: Lessons that are aimed at developing your fluency, grammar and speaking skills. I use either Skype  or Zoom platform for the lesson. All necessary materials are provided. You need only to attend the class and be on time. I'll be waiting for you!

pro_course_detail.title: Boost English Grammar
pro_course_detail.description: Booking this lesson, you might be sure your grammar is going to be improved in few lessons. We will discuss all the things that seem to you complicated.

pro_course_detail.title: Разговорный русский
pro_course_detail.description: Поговорим на интересующие вас темы. Выучим разговорные фразы, научу вас произносить и говорить правильно. Объясню грамматику.

teacher_info.intro:
Hi! My name is Alina. I am from Latvia, but I live in Gran Canaria. My native language is Russian, even though I am not from Russia. I am also a TEFL - certified English teacher. I went to the University of Birmingham (in England) where studied Tourism Management. After completing my university education, I've changed a few countries. I love travelling, so I decided that the best way to get to know any country is to live there for a while. I've lived in Tenerife, Cyprus and now Gran Canaria. 

If you would like to learn Russian from scratch - I am here to help!  If you are getting ready to start a university, or a new job where a high English level is required, hit me up!
teacher_info.short_signature: Russian Native Speaker; TEFL- Certified Professional English Teacher; MA Tourism Management (UK)

Hi! My name is Alina. I am from Latvia, but I live in Gran Canaria. My native language is Russian, even though I am not from Russia. I am also a TEFL - certified English teacher. teacher_info.about_teacher:
I wanted to become a teacher since my childhood. I always loved languages and cultural exchanges. 
About English Classes: I am focusing on speaking, grammar, job intreview preparation. Moreover, considering my work experience withing hospitality and tourism, I will be happy to help people who want to improve their language skills for work. I am a very customer - oriented person, with experience of providing a great guest experience, etc. I know how important is to understand cultural differences when speaking English. And more important, how to sound polite and professional. 

Russian Classes: Grammar & Speaking lessons. Fully flexible, depending on your needs.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I would love to hear from my students before the class so that I could prepare for the lesson and we can start working towards desired goals effectively and efficiently. My classes are flexible, can be adapted for your academic, work or business needs. I usually adapt "the direct method" of teaching, because it seems to me the most natural. I do involve students both into speaking and listening, using realistic daily situations. I love to teach languages without translating, like this students can learn HOW to use the language much faster. In case if any grammar rule has to be explained, can be done in Russian, English and Spanish. 
I also can include homework assignments.

course_info.trial_description: I would love to invite you to a trial lesson with me, where you can communicate your language goals and motivation to learn a language (whether it´s Russian or English). This will give me an idea of how to structure a lesson that will help to achieve your desired goals in the best way! I will offer you to go through some fun activities in order to establish your level. We will identify the gaps and make a plan for the further action.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for Beginners (learning from 0)
pro_course_detail.description: If you would like to learn some basics of Russian language such as Cyrillic alphabet and simple vocabulary - this lesson is made for you! We will work on vocabulary and pronunciation. As well as will learn how to create simple sentences. Depending on your needs, we can focus on general conversation topics or business/work oriented. I will offer you some activities and exercises as well as some grammar rules (according to your level).

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for Improvers (You should have some knowledge already)
pro_course_detail.description:
Hey! Have you already learnt Russian before? In this case, this lesson was created for you! Ты уже говоришь по–русски? Тогда тебе сюда!

This lesson is made for practising your Speaking skills! You will be free to choose the conversation topic. I will help you to work on your grammar and pronounciation too! Fully flexible, customized lesson and apadted to your needs.

pro_course_detail.title: General English for Everyone (Focused on Speaking, Listening and Reading Skills)
pro_course_detail.description: Hi! I would love to offer you an English speaking practice, which can be more formal or informal (depending on your requirements). We can focus on general topics such as travelling, food, interests, hobbies or business topics, work-related. You might be just moving to an English speaking country and just need someone to chat to in order to improve your confidence. Or you are looking for an English-speaking job. Or maybe just planning to travel abroad? Whatever it is, this "General English" lesson is made to satisfy your needs. Feel free to contact me!

pro_course_detail.title: English Grammar (Main focus on grammar exercises)
pro_course_detail.description: Not always we can improve our language skills just by conversational practice. Sometimes it's great to stop for a second, identify our gaps and get explained how to use some specific rules. Grammar lessons don't have to be boring, they can be very entertaining and fun! I will help you to improve your spelling skills too. All my lessons are customized, depending on your aims and goals. Feel free to give it a go!

pro_course_detail.title: English for Young learners (10+) Children Only!
pro_course_detail.description: This lesson is designed for kids who already have some basic English knowledge. We will practice speaking and reading, using plenty of visual materials!

Creo que aprender debe ser fácil y interesante por eso para mis clases preparo un documento que contiene textos, audios, ejercicios. Hago estos documentos personalmente para cada estudiante.

pro_course_detail.title: General English A1-B1
pro_course_detail.description:

pro_course_detail.title: TORFL Exam Preparation / Подготовка к экзамену ТРКИ
pro_course_detail.description:
Test of Russian as a foreign language (TORFL) is an international exam to determine the level of Russian language proficiency.  I'm ready to help you prepare for any of its six levels:
- Elementary Level (TEL/A1)
- Basic Level (TBL/A2)
- First Certification Level (TORFL-I/B1)
- The 2nd Level Certificate (TORFL-II /В2)
- The 3rd Level Certificate (TORFL-III /C1)
- The 4th Level Certificate (TORFL-IV/C2)

Each level comprises five subtests: 
- Grammar and Vocabulary
- Reading
- Listening 
- Writing
- Speaking.

teacher_info.intro:
My name is Iuliia, I am 35 years old. Now I live and work in Niigata. I was born in Ukraine. I have lived in Europe, America, and Asia, and one day plan to try living in  New Zealand. My hobbies are teaching, yoga, trying new foods, running outside, hiking, and doing whatever makes me genuinely happy. Peace to Ukraine!
If you are interested in talking about traveling, life goals, psychology, and world philosophies send me an email, I'm up for a respectful discussion in English, Russian, Ukrainian, or in Japanese (pre-intermediate, but working on it), and I will always find the time for an interesting class.
teacher_info.short_signature: MA in TEFL. A decade of teaching languages. A lifetime of learning.
teacher_info.about_me:
My name is Iuliia, I am 35 years old. Now I live and work in Niigata. I was born in Ukraine. I have lived in Europe, America, and Asia, and one day plan to try living in  New Zealand. My hobbies are teaching, yoga, trying new foods, running outside, hiking, and doing whatever makes me genuinely happy. Peace to Ukraine!
If you are interested in talking about traveling, life goals, psychology, and world philosophies send me an email, I'm up for a respectful discussion in English, Russian, Ukrainian, or in Japanese (pre-intermediate, but working on it), and I will always find the time for an interesting class.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I am a licensed EFL teacher and specialize in grammar and accent reduction. I've been helping my students prepare for EIKEN ever since I came to Japan. I had to take TOEFL iBT back when I was applying to the University of Minnesota, and I got 110 points (the equivalent to EIKEN 1). If you are preparing for either EIKEN or TOEFL, I have the materials, qualifications, and experience necessary to help you succeed.
Teaching and learning are two of my biggest hobbies. Mastering Japanese is my current goal. I am fascinated by the cultural aspects of grammar, and how different environmental factors shape different languages and mentalities. I am incredibly grateful I can work as a teacher.
teacher_info.teaching_style: I was born in the USSR, so 1/3 of my education happened in Russian, another 1/3 in Ukrainian, and 1/3 in English (US). Active discussion is the key to fluency. My lessons are 75% discussion. I strongly encourage my students to ask as many questions as possible, the trick is to form the questions on the spot, not beforehand - that's a key to having a 'live' conversation. I provide all the materials; doing homework is optional.
